#summary Installation instructions

The archive for OCL2ACSL update site can be found at this link:

https://svn.codespot.com/a/eclipselabs.org/ocl2acsl/trunk/ocl2Acsl_update_site/ocl2Acsl_update_site.zip

To install it, follow these instructions :
 # Download and unzip the archive
 # In Eclipse, go to Help – Install New Software
 # Add the update site by using the Add… button
 # Select Local and locate the unzipped archive 
 # The plug-in appears in the list of available plug-ins
 # Check it, select Next and follow the wizard
